name: Yachtcoin
description: Yacht Coin ($YACHT) is a meme token launched on Clanker and integrated into the Farcaster ecosystem. Designed to tap into the viral culture of crypto, $YACHT is a community-driven project with no inherent utility or roadmap. Its value is derived entirely from community engagement, meme-driven marketing, and social momentum. The project aims to gamify wallet balances by associating token holdings with increasingly extravagant virtual yachts, encouraging holders to level up their status in a lighthearted, yacht-themed ecosystem. While $YACHT does not offer traditional utility, it serves as a playful experiment in decentralized internet culture and attention-driven value.
